title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3430/85 of 5 December 1985 fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases on account of the accession of Spain and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 2050/85
header:
COMMISSCOMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3430/85
of 5 December 1985
fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases on account of the accession of Spain and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 2050/85
THETHE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The weighting coefficients referred to in Article 4 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2759/75 shall be specified as in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 March 1986 subject to the entry into force of the Act of Accession of Spain and Portugal.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 December 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
((1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 307, 18. 11. 1980, p. 5.
(3) OJ No L 223, 16. 8. 1976, p. 4.
(4) OJ No L 281, 10. 11. 1979, p. 41.
(5) OJ No L 193, 25. 7. 1985, p. 21.
ANNEX
Weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases
Belgium 5,8
Denmark 9,8
Germany 25,8
France 12,1
Greece 1,2
Spain 12,6
Ireland 1,1
Italy 9,9
Luxembourg 0,1
Netherlands 13,0
United Kingdom 8,6
